boblovespihonkaimod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultClickableReli.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultClickableReli.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

boblovespihonkaimod:starterRelic.NAME: Stigmata
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yHonkai at the end of each turn. At the end of combat, take damage equal to the amount of #yHonkai you have.

boblovespihonkaimod:decayedFragment.NAME: Decayed Fragment
boblovespihonkaimod:decayedFragment.FLAVOR: A piece of a now dead Honkai core. You can still feel some Honkai energy lingering in it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b5 #yHonkai at the start of each combat.
